title: React Basics
description: A simple React app that fetches data from an API and displays it on the page. The app also allows you to search for specific objects by name.

title: E Comm App
description: This project is on hold for now. It is a React app that will be an e-commerce store.

title: Airbnb Backend Clone with Sanity.io
description: This project is on hold for now. It is a backend clone of Airbnb using Sanity.io.

title: Access WTX Weather API
description: This project is on hold for now, and will be able to provides access to weather data from the WTX weather station.

title: Webpack
description: This project allows you to build out a React app from scratch without having to use create-react-app.
